name: populateSubjectId
label: Populate Subject ID
description: This module generates a list of fields whose values are the IDs of the selected site's subjects. The module should be placed in a category above the category where the IDs will be saved.

fields.name: fieldName
fields.label: Field Name
fields.description: Field name where IDs will be saved.

fields.name: categoryName
fields.label: Category Name
fields.description: Category name where IDs will be saved. This should be repeating.
